config.name: config
config.description: A collection of admin-only configuration commands

show.name: show
show.description: Show this server's current config options.

set-create-channel.name: set-create-channel
set-create-channel.description: Set the channel users will join to have a voice channel automatically created.

add-ownership-roles.name: add-ownership-roles
add-ownership-roles.description: Set the roles that are allowed to claim ownership of a channel.

rename.name: rename
rename.description: Rename a voice channel you own.

new-name.name: name
new-name.description: The new name of your channel, must be between 1 and 50 characters long.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Change the user limit of a voice channel you own.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: The max number of users that can join this channel, must be between 1 and 99, set to 0 for infinite.

kick.name: kick
kick.description: Kick a user from a voice channel you own.

reason.name: reason
reason.description: A short description of why this user needed to be kicked

block.name: block
block.description: Block a user from accessing a voice channel you own.

reason.name: reason
reason.description: A short description of why this user needed to be blocked

unblock.name: unblock
unblock.description: Unblock a user from a voice channel you own.

reason.name: reason
reason.description: A short description of why this user is being unblocked

transfer.name: transfer
transfer.description: Transfer ownership of a voice channel to another user.

user.name: user
user.description: The user to transfer ownership to.

confirm.name: confirm
confirm.description: Type CONFIRM to verify you aren't doing this by accident.
